comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Flag for me... Doctor's orders. Sort of.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Jeez, when will the Frenz learn not to let SB carry the lantern? Matt's trail of GPS breadcrumbs looks like a Miro on acid. I think we're going to have to equip the Frenz w/ EPIRB's for any future tours mapped out by SB's RSNS (Random-Synapse Navigational System). Sorry I missed it, though...
